thread.title: Ground News - Letter: Let’s reinvest in our rail system
thread.title_full: Ground News - Letter: Let’s reinvest in our rail system

author: vaildaily.com
title: Ground News - Letter: Let’s reinvest in our rail system
text:
Summary by vaildaily.com What a great article about trains in the Wednesday Vail Daily. Colorado could become a model for the country. The tracks are there and just need to be refurbished, this is where our government needs to step in. The government built the instate road system and now can reinvest in our rail system. Our roads are packed, I think the truck traffic on I-70 today is equal to all the traffic back in the 90s. Trains rarely if ever are affected by weath… Share menu More
